data.title: Database of Yankee Uniform Numbers Through the Years
data.meta_description: Database of New York Yankee uniform numbers, Yankee and baseball related commentary, trivia, information and more.
data.text:
If you clicked on the info icon or the "Stats / Notes / Bio" link, you've reached this page which contains notes, memories, trivia and more about Luis Cruz. If you have anything to add to this player's information, an interesting bit of trivia or a personal memory or story about Luis, please feel free to share it with us by filling out the form at the bottom of the page. Be sure to include your name and town.

View career stats on BaseballReference.com

Sorry. I haven't had time to add biographical information, notes or anything on this player yet...but please keep checking back. I try to add a little more to the site every time I get a chance.
